dublinCore.dc:title: SJ 13 ENR: Providing for congressional disapproval under chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code, of the rule submitted by the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency of the Department of the Treasury relating to the review of applications under the Bank Merger Act.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.congress: One Hundred Nineteenth Congress of the United States of America
form.enrolled-dateline: Begun and held at the City of Washington on Friday, the third day of January, two thousand and twenty five
form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES
form.official-title: Providing for congressional disapproval under chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code, of the rule submitted by the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency of the Department of the Treasury relating to the review of applications under the Bank Merger Act.

section.text: That Congress disapproves the rule submitted by the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency of the Department of the Treasury relating to Business Combinations Under the Bank Merger Act (89 Fed. Reg. 78207 (September 25, 2024)), and such rule shall have no force or effect.

attestation-group.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate
